content: Implement accessibility updates: skip link, ARIA roles, keyboard nav
Enable route-based code splitting with React.lazy and Suspense
Add basic analytics abstraction and page view tracking
Enhance Support page: contact form and chat widget scaffold
Add download tracking hooks and progress indicators
Add user feedback forms site-wide
Add print-friendly styles for key pages
Implement newsletter signup and social links
Add business pages: partner program and API docs (skeletons)
Add community skeletons: forum and blog
Fix analytics module context binding issue
Integrate Newsletter component into Home page
Integrate FeedbackForm component into Support page
Add social media links to Footer component
Create skeleton pages for Partner Program and API Documentation
Create skeleton pages for Community Forum and Blog
Implement caching strategies and CDN integration
Add user journey analysis and feature usage statistics
Add language selector for international users
Add error boundaries for better error handling
